Package com.company

Class ConnectionFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.ConnectionFunctions
  • public final class ConnectionFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
    connectionfunctions class has static functions that can will be called by multicast or rmi servers to communicate between or functions convert data to be possible to be sent to each other

      • establishConnectionServer

        public static java.net.ServerSocket establishConnectionServer​(int port)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        create socket for server to establish tcp connection
        Parameters:
        port - to bind the socket (multicast server: 53287 for receiving files, 53288 for sending files)
        Returns:
        server socket already created and connected to port supplied
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • establishConnectionClient

                                                        int port)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        create a socket for client to establish tcp connection
        Parameters:
        TCPAddress - address to connect to (multicast address)
        port - to bind the socket
        Returns:
        client socket already created with port and tcp address
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • sendMusicFromRMIClient

        public static void sendMusicFromRMIClient​(java.lang.String filePath,
                                          int musicID,
                                          java.lang.String username,
                                          java.lang.String TCPAddress)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        send file from rmi client (upload music to multicast server for example)
        Parameters:
        filePath - file location in local computer
        musicID - id from the database to associate a file to one music
        username - of the user that sends the music to the server
        TCPAddress - used to connect to the server (the multicast address)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

                                               java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • sendMusicFromMulticastServer

                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                java.sql.SQLException
        send file from multicast server (to rmi client, rmi client downloads a file for example)
        Parameters:
        musicID - that rmiclient wants to download, to grab from the database
        username - of the rmiclient, to grab from the database
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.sql.SQLException

        Parameters:

        java.io.IOException

      • sendBytes

        public static void sendBytes​(byte[] myByteArray,
                             int start,
                             int len,
                             java.net.Socket socket)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        send bytes (file converted to bytes to be send by tcp connection) to one socket
        Parameters:
        myByteArray - file converted in bytes
        start - the beggining of the array, normally 0
        len - the length of the array, normally myByteArray.length
        socket - where you want to send the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
